Class Interactable

java.lang.Object
city.cs.engine.Body
city.cs.engine.StaticBody
game.Interactable
All Implemented Interfaces:
city.cs.engine.SensorListener, EventListener
public class Interactable extends city.cs.engine.StaticBody implements city.cs.engine.SensorListener
interactable object the player can interact with

  • Constructor Details

    • Interactable

      public Interactable(GameWorld world, city.cs.engine.Shape shape, int type, org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 position, GifPlayer gifPlayer)
      initialises an interactble
      Parameters:
      world - reference to level it is created in
      shape - sets the shape of the object
      type - int value associated with the type of object it is and what image and gif to display as well as associated behaviour
      position - sets the position of the object in the game world
      gifPlayer - sets the gifPlayer to allow manipulation within the class

      path - reference to the image file in the data folder
